result.html: bhí fonn orm teacht anseoI felt like coming here.
result.ponchtml: ḃí fonn orm teaċt anseoI felt like coming here.

result.html: bhí fonn troda airHe felt like fighting.
result.ponchtml: ḃí fonn troda airHe felt like fighting.

result.eng: One night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.
result.ga: oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.orig: oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.html: oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlárOne night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.
result.ponchtml: oíċe aṁáin ṁoṫaiġ sé go raiḃ sé á ṫaċtaḋ agus ṫit sé ina ċnap ar an urlárOne night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.

result.eng: One of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ga: rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.orig: rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.html: rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ponchtml: rinne duine aṁáin drannaḋ liom agus ḃraiṫ mé ċoṁ beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.

result.eng: She still felt nauseous from the incident.
result.ga: bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtra
result.orig: bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtra
result.html: bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtraShe still felt nauseous from the incident.
result.ponchtml: ḃí masmas uirṫi fós de ṫoraḋ na heaċtraShe still felt nauseous from the incident.

result.eng: Going to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ga: ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.html: ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadhGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ponchtml: ba ḋoiliġ a ġaḃáil ċun faoiside ina ḋiaiḋ sin dar leis féin go gcaiṫfeaḋ sé an gealltanas a ċoṁlíonaḋGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.

result.eng: The day I was set free I felt happy.
result.ga: an lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroí
result.orig: an lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroí
result.html: an lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroíThe day I was set free I felt happy.
result.ponchtml: an lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo ċroíThe day I was set free I felt happy.

result.eng: He felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ga: bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do mhicheál dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.orig: bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do mhicheál dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.html: bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do mhicheál dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ponchtml: ḃí truaiġ an tsaoil aige do ṁiċeál duḃ agus don ḃail a ċuir an ḃantraċt airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.

result.eng: He felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ga: bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.orig: bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.html: bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ponchtml: ḃí truaiġ aige dóiḃ aċ truaiġ gan tarrṫáil a ḃí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
